name: Final Fatality
description:
Fight to defeat enemies and unlock special abilities and weapons.
Many weapons and eye catching skills waiting for you to unlock.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap at middle of the bar
- Collect weapons and upgrade powers
- Defeat bosses

FEATURES:
- Many weapons: bows, axes, wand, swords, hand fighting...
- Various skins
- Lot of power ups
